definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Please wait a moment, Jane is on another line.
sentences.chinese: 请等那一霎那，简正在接另一条电话线。

sentences.english: Does this household have a fixed line telephone?
sentences.chinese: 本户是否有固定的电话线？

sentences.english: She said the storm had brought down the telephone lines and I'd need to go to the signal box.
sentences.chinese: 她说是暴风雨把电话线给吹断，我要到信号房去。

sentences.english: All you need is a phone line.
sentences.chinese: 你所需要的这是一条电话线。

sentences.english: Caller calls into the chat line.
It is common for heavy icicles to bring down power and telephone wires after an ice storm.
sentences.chinese: 是很常见的重型冰柱，以降低电力和电话线后，冰暴。

sentences.english: A flat-rate party line with two subscribers.
sentences.chinese: 一种两个用户合用的包月制电话线。

sentences.english: a telephone line connecting two exchanges directly.
sentences.chinese: 直接联系两个交换器的电话线。

sentences.english: A generator for electricity. A well for water.
sentences.chinese: 没有电话线，用发电机发电，打井来供应水源。

sentences.english: Then switchboards brought phone wires into one location.
sentences.chinese: 然后，交换台使电话线集中到一个地点。

sentences.english: Today, my telephone line was hit by lightning.
sentences.chinese: 今天我的电话线被雷劈了。

sentences.english: Preceding but theory, say the regiment of nucleus that settle the layer, lack what, telephone line.
sentences.chinese: 就上篇而论，说了断层的核团，缺什么呢，电话线呀。

sentences.english: Fiber-optic cable is rapidly replacing twisted-pair telephone lines.
sentences.chinese: 光缆正迅速地取代双绞线的电话线。

sentences.english: The lines that carry cable television are much faster than standard phone lines or even ISDN.
sentences.chinese: 运载有线电视的线比标准电话线甚至ISDN快速。

sentences.english: One Flat rate residential phone line.
sentences.chinese: 一种包月制住宅电话线。

sentences.english: Like ISDN, ADSL will use normal qualified copper phone lines.
sentences.chinese: 和ISDN一样，ADSL使用普通合格的铜电话线。
